function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Positive and natural sound sources becoming disturbing during reduced outdoor noise levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in annoyance ratings of neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistency in noise annoyance research results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in neighbor and outdoor noise patterns during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise during lockdown due to more people staying and working from home.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise complaints during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial increase in time spent on entertainment during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in annoyance ratings due to lockdown may lead to a false sense of improvement in noise issues, potentially causing complacency in preventative measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consistent high annoyance ratings during lockdown suggest underlying factors contributing to dissatisfaction with noise levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased negative perception of bird songs in urban areas due to reduced ambient noise levels during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in attitudes towards outdoor noise levels during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings for neighbour noise sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints on social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difference in neighbor noise perception based on time spent in different areas of the house","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased percentage of respondents hearing neighbour noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in mean annoyance ratings for certain noise sources during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of neighbour noise annoyance ratings across dwelling types","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased noise complaints across various noise sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sleep disturbance due to neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints during lockdown, particularly due to birds and construction/building works","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise complaints for transport and voice/instrument sources during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased number of noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically significant increase in tweets with noise complaints during the lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing noise levels before and during lockdown may indicate changes in behavior and activity, impacting disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Annoyance caused by noise pollution may lead to stress and weakened immune systems, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of annoyance ratings to percentage of highly annoyed may oversimplify the impact of commonly touched surfaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through manual extraction of tweets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related collection from twitter may include biased samples and may not represent the entire population’s attitudes towards noise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of attitudes towards noise before and during the lockdown may not account for external factors that influence noise perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis rely on social media, which may not capture the attitudes of individuals who do not use social media platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased noise
